1: <sup>1</sup> God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
2: <sup>2</sup> How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
3: <sup>3</sup> Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
4: <sup>4</sup> Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
5: <sup>5</sup> They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
6: <sup>6</sup> I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
7: <sup>7</sup> But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
8: <sup>8</sup> Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
